introduction.text: Surgery Partners is a leading operator of surgical facilities and ancillary services with more than 150 locations nationwide. We provide exceptional integrated healthcare experiences between our providers and patients.

statistics.label: Annual same-facility growth over the past five years

timeline.description: Our story began in 2004 with the formation of Surgery Partners with a physician-centric operating philosophy.
We merged with NovaMed in 2011 with a focus on ophthalmology services.
After achieving a milestone of ten successful years, we merged with Symbion Healthcare, a large multispecialty provider of ambulatory surgery centers and hospitals.
On October 1, 2015, Surgery Partners completed an Initial Public Offering (NASDAQ: SGRY).

In 2017 we announced the acquisition of National Surgical Healthcare, representing a unique opportunity to establish the largest standalone, independent surgical facilities operator in the United States, with a strong presence in musculoskeletal procedures.

timeline.headline: Today
timeline.description: We are an industry leader in surgical services, with a differentiated outpatient delivery  model backed by our suite of ancillary service offerings in support our physicians, including multi-specialty physician practices, urgent care facilities, anesthesia services, laboratory services, specialty pharmacy services, and optical services.
